name: 猎人物语
description:
《Hunter Story》is a horizontal action game which Use 2D cartoon style. Players play legendary hunters in the game. As a hunter, you must collect equipment and hunting monsters to survive in the vast world.StorylineOnce upon a time, Suddenly a lot of monsters from the paranormal world appeared. The ferocious monster began to invade the hunter town. With the threat of monsters, the hunter guild decided to recruit hunters to kill the monsters. Our hero ,the best hunter in the hunter town began his hunting story...Game featuresYou can equip 5 types of weapons. Some weapons can attack the enemy remotely and some weapons can attack the enemy face to face. Some weapons attack fast and some weapons are slow to attack. At the same time, each type of weapon has a wealth of skills.
Dozens of monsters, more than 300 props, 5 types of weapons...
It's all up to you to choose how to hunt.



We just want to give you the best experience. We hope you enjoy the game.
